verses.verse: Afterward he brought <WH935> me to the temple, <WH1964> and measured <WH4058> the posts, <WH352> six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341> on the one side, <WH6311> and six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341> on the other <WH6311> side, which was the breadth <WH7341> of the tabernacle. <WH168>

And the breadth <WH7341> of the door <WH6607> was ten <WH6235> cubits; <WH520> and the sides <WH3802> of the door <WH6607> were five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> on the one side, and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> on the other <WH6311> side: and he measured <WH4058> the length <WH753> thereof, forty <WH705> cubits: <WH520> and the breadth, <WH7341> twenty <WH6242> cubits. <WH520>

Then went <WH935> he inward, <WH6441> and measured <WH4058> the post <WH352> of the door, <WH6607> two <WH8147> cubits; <WH520> and the door, <WH6607> six <WH8337> cubits; <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of the door, <WH6607> seven <WH7651> cubits. <WH520>

So he measured <WH4058> the length <WH753> thereof, twenty <WH6242> cubits; <WH520> and the breadth, <WH7341> twenty <WH6242> cubits, <WH520> before <WH413> <WH6440> the temple: <WH1964> and he said <WH559> to me, This <WH2088> is the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place.

After he measured <WH4058> the wall <WH7023> of the house, <WH1004> six <WH8337> cubits; <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of every side <WH6763> chamber, <WH6763> four <WH702> cubits, <WH520> round <WH5439> about the house <WH1004> on every <WH5437> side. <WH5439>

And the side <WH6763> chambers <WH6763> were three, <WH7969> one over <WH413> another, and thirty <WH7970> in order; <WH6471> and they entered <WH935> into the wall <WH7023> which <WH834> was of the house <WH1004> for the side <WH6763> chambers <WH6763> round <WH5439> about, that they might have <WH1961> hold, <WH270> but they had <WH1961> not hold <WH270> in the wall <WH7023> of the house. <WH1004>

And there was an enlarging, <WH7337> and a winding <WH5437> about still upward <WH4605> to the side <WH6763> chambers: <WH6763> for the winding <WH4141> about of the house <WH1004> went still upward <WH4605> round <WH5439> about the house: <WH1004> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the breadth <WH7341> of the house <WH1004> was still upward, <WH4605> and so increased <WH5927> from the lowest <WH8481> chamber to the highest <WH5945> by the middle. <WH8484>

I saw <WH7200> also the height <WH1364> of the house <WH1004> round <WH5439> about: the foundations <WH4328> of the side <WH6763> chambers <WH6763> were a full <WH4393> reed <WH7070> of six <WH8337> great <WH679> cubits. <WH520>

The thickness <WH7341> of the wall, <WH7023> which <WH834> was for the side <WH6763> chamber <WH6763> without, <WH2351> was five <WH2568> cubits: <WH520> and that which was left <WH5117> was the place <WH1004> of the side <WH6763> chambers <WH6763> that were within. <WH1004>
And between <WH996> the chambers <WH3957> was the wideness <WH7341> of twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> round <WH5439> about the house <WH1004> on every <WH5437> side. <WH5439>

And the doors <WH6607> of the side <WH6763> chambers <WH6763> were toward <WH1870> the place that was left, <WH5117> one <WH259> door <WH6607> toward <WH1870> the north, <WH6828> and another <WH259> door <WH6607> toward <WH1870> the south: <WH1864> and the breadth <WH7341> of the place <WH4725> that was left <WH5117> was five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> round <WH5439> about.

Now the building <WH1146> that was before <WH413> <WH6440> the separate <WH1508> place at the end <WH6285> toward <WH1870> the west <WH3220> was seventy <WH7657> cubits <WH520> broad; <WH7341> and the wall <WH7023> of the building <WH1146> was five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> thick <WH7341> round <WH5439> about, and the length <WH753> thereof ninety <WH8673> cubits. <WH520>

So he measured <WH4058> the house, <WH1004> an hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long; <WH753> and the separate <WH1508> place, and the building, <WH1140> with the walls <WH7023> thereof, an hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long; <WH753>
Also the breadth <WH7341> of the face <WH6440> of the house, <WH1004> and of the separate <WH1508> place toward the east, <WH6921> an hundred <WH3967> cubits. <WH520>

And he measured <WH4058> the length <WH753> of the building <WH1146> over <WH413> <WH6440> against <WH6440> the separate <WH1508> place which <WH834> was behind <WH310> it, and the galleries <WH862> thereof on the one side and on the other <WH6311> side, an hundred <WH3967> cubits, <WH520> with the inner <WH6442> temple, <WH1964> and the porches <WH197> of the court; <WH2691>

The door <WH5592> posts, <WH5592> and the narrow <WH331> windows, <WH2474> and the galleries <WH862> round <WH5439> about on their three <WH7969> stories, over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the door, <WH5592> paneled <WH7824> with wood <WH6086> round <WH5439> about, and from the ground <WH776> up to the windows, <WH2474> and the windows <WH2474> were covered; <WH3680>

To that above <WH5921> the door, <WH6607> even to the inner <WH6442> house, <WH1004> and without, <WH2351> and by all <WH3605> the wall <WH7023> round <WH5439> about within <WH6442> and without, <WH2435> by measure. <WH4060>

And it was made <WH6213> with cherubim <WH3742> and palm <WH8561> trees, so that a palm <WH8561> tree was between <WH996> a cherub <WH3742> and a cherub; <WH3742> and every cherub <WH3742> had two <WH8147> faces; <WH6440>

So that the face <WH6440> of a man <WH120> was toward <WH413> the palm <WH8561> tree on the one side, and the face <WH6440> of a young <WH3715> lion <WH3715> toward <WH413> the palm <WH8561> tree on the other <WH6311> side: it was made <WH6213> through <WH413> all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> round <WH5439> about.
From the ground <WH776> to above <WH5921> the door <WH6607> were cherubim <WH3742> and palm <WH8561> trees made, <WH6213> and on the wall <WH7023> of the temple. <WH1964>
The posts <WH4201> of the temple <WH1964> were squared, <WH7251> and the face <WH6440> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> the appearance <WH4758> of the one as the appearance <WH4758> of the other.

The altar <WH4196> of wood <WH6086> was three <WH7969> cubits <WH520> high, <WH1364> and the length <WH753> thereof two <WH8147> cubits; <WH520> and the corners <WH4740> thereof, and the length <WH753> thereof, and the walls <WH7023> thereof, were of wood: <WH6086> and he said <WH1696> to me, This <WH2088> is the table <WH7979> that is before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>
And the temple <WH1964> and the sanctuary <WH6944> had two <WH8147> doors. <WH1817>

And the doors <WH1817> had two <WH8147> leaves <WH1817> apiece, two <WH8147> turning <WH4142> leaves; <WH1817> two <WH8147> leaves for the one <WH259> door, <WH1817> and two <WH8147> leaves <WH1817> for the other <WH312> door. <WH1817>

And there were made <WH6213> on <WH413> them, on <WH413> the doors <WH1817> of the temple, <WH1964> cherubim <WH3742> and palm <WH8561> trees, like as were made <WH6213> on the walls; <WH7023> and there were thick <WH5645> planks <WH6086> on the face <WH6440> of the porch <WH197> without. <WH2351>

And there were narrow <WH331> windows <WH2474> and palm <WH8561> trees on the one side and on the other <WH6311> side, on <WH413> the sides <WH3802> of the porch, <WH197> and on the side <WH6763> chambers <WH6763> of the house, <WH1004> and thick planks. <WH5646>
